communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Evanston “Here to Stay” Subcommittee Emails
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

In the response to FOIA record request #24-2000, the existence of approximately 16,000 email threads related to the “Here to Stay” subcommittee was acknowledged (see attached PDF "Request_24-2000_NextRequest.pdf") as part of our list of requested records:

"Any communications, including emails and memos, related to the scheduling, conduct, and outcomes of the “Here to Stay” subcommittee meetings."

Given the volume of emails, we are creating a new FOIA request to seek only the metadata of these email communications in order to avoid any undue burden. 

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act, we hereby request the following metadata for all emails referenced in record request #24-2000:

– Sender
– Recipient (To, CC, BCC)
– Date and time sent
– Subject line

We are not requesting the full content of the emails, only the specified metadata. Please provide this metadata in a spreadsheet format, such as CSV or Excel. For an example of this type of retrieval you can reference record request #24-847.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,
Niles Coalition
